subject: Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Fabian Cancellara broke away on the final hill of the Tour of Flanders and finished the classic in his time-trial style to win the race ahead of Peter Sagan of Slovakia.
snippet: Fabian Cancellara broke away on the final hill of the Tour of Flanders and finished the classic in his time-trial style to win the race ahead of Peter Sagan of Slovakia.
